original_text: They will also take you, Pashhur, and everybody who lives in your house. They will take you as prisoners to Babylon. You will die there and people will bury you there. The same thing will happen to all your friends. You spoke false messages to these people, as if they were messages from me.” ’
korean_text: 바스훌아 너와 네 집에 사는 모든 사람이 포로 되어 옮겨지리니 네가 바벨론에 이르러 거기서 죽어 거기 묻힐 것이라 너와 너의 거짓 예언을 들은 네 모든 친구도 그와 같으리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: and everybody who lives in your house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 집에 사는 모든 사람들

sentences.original_text: They will take you as prisoners
and people will bury you there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들이 너를 거기에 묻을 것이다

sentences.original_text: as if they were messages from me
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 그것이 나로부터 온 메시지인 것처럼
